exec: pm.test("Should be able to create user", function () {

header.value: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/77.0.3865.90 Safari/537.36

graphql.query:
mutation (
    $orcid: String!, 
    $email: String!, 
    $password: String!,
    $firstname: String!,
    $lastname: String!,
    $position: String!,
    $phone: String!,
    $nationality: Int!
) {
  createUser(
    user_title: "Ms."
    firstname: $firstname
    preferredname: $firstname
    lastname: $lastname
    password: $password
    orcid: $orcid
    orcidHash: ""
    refreshToken: ""
    gender: "female"
    nationality: $nationality
    birthdate: "2000-01-01"
    organisation: 7
    department: "QA"
    position: $position
    email: $email
    telephone: $phone
    )
    {
        user
        {
          id
          email
        }
    }
}
